Take a New Test
Add a Name
Welcome to JinArya App This App lets you calculate your compatibility with other people in realtime
Test with Anyone You can test with your Friends or with your Partner
Customised Tests and Detailed Results Tests are customised based on the person you take the test with, So results vary from person to person and Each Test gives a detailed Result
Access your Test Reports You can also access all your previous test Reports Anytime
To see the welcome slider again, goto menu -> About app Play Again
Start
By Using this app, you agree to our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy mentioned at www.google.com Share Report Delete Report
